allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete 3-tier tech stack foundation

Set up full project structure with React frontend, Node.js/Express backend,
and MySQL database configuration following all project standards.

## Frontend Setup
- React 18.3 + Vite 5.2 build tooling
- Material UI v6 with Material Design 3
- React Router v7 for client-side routing
- TanStack Query v5 for server state management
- Axios for API calls with interceptor configuration
- Directory structure: components, pages, hooks, context, services, utils, theme
- Testing: Vitest + React Testing Library
- Code quality: ESLint, Prettier, Husky, lint-staged
- Environment: .env.example with API base URL config

## Backend Setup
- Express 5.1 web framework
- Sequelize 6 ORM for MySQL
- Security middleware: helmet, cors, rate-limiting
- Authentication: Passport.js + JWT (configured, ready to use)
- Validation: Joi request validation
- Logging: Winston structured logging
- Error handling: Custom ApiError class and middleware
- Directory structure: config, controllers, services, models, routes, middlewares, validators, utils
- Database: Sequelize CLI for migrations and seeds
- Testing: Jest + Supertest
- Code quality: ESLint (Airbnb), Prettier, Husky

## Database Setup
- MySQL 8+ configuration with Sequelize
- Database initialization script (init.sql)
- Comprehensive setup documentation
- Migration system ready
- Existing schema files for books, authors, patrons, checkouts

## Utility Scripts
- start-all.sh: Start both frontend and backend services
- start-backend.sh: Smart backend startup with health check
- start-frontend.sh: Smart frontend startup
- stop-all.sh: Gracefully stop all services
- All scripts check if services already running
- Auto-install dependencies if missing
- Auto-create .env files from examples
- Logging to logs/ directory

## Documentation
- Updated README.md with complete project structure and setup instructions
- QUICK_START.md for 5-minute setup guide
- database/README.md with database setup and troubleshooting
- scripts/README.md with detailed script documentation

## Verification
- Backend server tested and verified (health endpoint working)
- Frontend build tested and verified
- All scripts tested and working
- Follows all standards in standards/quick-ref/
